projects.name: AI Trading System
projects.description_short: AI-powered cryptocurrency trading simulator with real-time price prediction, backtesting engine, and risk-free paper trading.
projects.description_long: Experience the future of cryptocurrency trading with AI-powered predictions and zero financial risk. This comprehensive trading simulator features TensorFlow.js-powered ML models with 73.2% accuracy, TradingView professional charts, real-time CoinGecko market data, and a complete backtesting engine. Built with Astro and TypeScript, the platform provides $10,000 virtual capital for risk-free learning, portfolio analytics, AI trade suggestions with confidence scoring, and mobile-optimized performance. The cyberpunk-themed interface makes learning crypto trading strategies both educational and engaging.

projects.name: Data Visualization Platform
projects.description_short: Interactive dashboard for real-time analytics and business intelligence with customizable widgets and reporting.
projects.description_long: A powerful data visualization platform that transforms raw business data into interactive, real-time dashboards. Built with modern web technologies, it supports multiple data sources including databases, APIs, and file uploads. Features include drag-and-drop dashboard creation, customizable widgets, advanced filtering, automated report generation, and team collaboration tools. The platform can handle millions of data points with optimized rendering and includes export capabilities for presentations and reports.

projects.name: Neural Network Framework
projects.description_short: Custom deep learning framework optimized for computer vision tasks with GPU acceleration and distributed training.
projects.description_long: A high-performance neural network framework built from scratch in C++ with Python bindings, specifically optimized for computer vision applications. Features include automatic differentiation, GPU acceleration using CUDA, distributed training across multiple nodes, and optimized convolution operations. The framework includes pre-built architectures for image classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation. Benchmarks show 30% faster training times compared to TensorFlow on similar hardware configurations.

projects.name: Blockchain Analytics Engine
projects.description_short: Real-time blockchain transaction analysis and pattern detection for DeFi protocols and smart contracts.
projects.description_long: A comprehensive blockchain analytics platform that monitors and analyzes transactions across multiple blockchain networks in real-time. The system tracks DeFi protocol interactions, identifies suspicious patterns, and provides insights into market movements. Features include smart contract analysis, wallet clustering, transaction flow visualization, and automated alert systems for unusual activities. Used by several crypto exchanges and DeFi protocols for compliance and security monitoring.

projects.name: ML Model Deployment Platform
projects.description_short: Automated platform for deploying and scaling machine learning models with monitoring and A/B testing capabilities.
projects.description_long: An enterprise-grade platform for deploying machine learning models to production with zero downtime. Features include automated model versioning, A/B testing frameworks, real-time performance monitoring, auto-scaling based on demand, and comprehensive logging. The platform supports various ML frameworks and provides REST APIs, batch processing, and streaming inference capabilities. Includes built-in security features like authentication, rate limiting, and model access controls.

projects.name: IoT Sensor Network
projects.description_short: Distributed IoT system for environmental monitoring with edge computing and predictive analytics.
projects.description_long: A scalable IoT sensor network designed for environmental monitoring across large geographical areas. The system includes custom hardware sensors, edge computing nodes for real-time processing, and a cloud platform for data aggregation and analysis. Features predictive analytics for environmental trends, automated alerting systems, and integration with government environmental APIs. Currently deployed in three cities for air quality monitoring with over 200 active sensor nodes.

projects.name: Natural Language Processor
projects.description_short: Advanced NLP pipeline for multilingual text analysis, sentiment detection, and content classification.
projects.description_long: A sophisticated natural language processing system that handles multiple languages and provides comprehensive text analysis capabilities. Features include sentiment analysis, entity recognition, content classification, summarization, and language detection. The system uses transformer-based models and includes custom training pipelines for domain-specific applications. Deployed as microservices with REST APIs and supports batch processing for large document collections.

projects.name: Quantum Algorithm Simulator
projects.description_short: High-performance quantum computing simulator for algorithm research and educational purposes.
projects.description_long: A quantum computing simulator designed for researchers and students to experiment with quantum algorithms without access to physical quantum computers. The simulator supports various quantum gates, circuit optimization, noise simulation, and visualization of quantum states. Includes implementations of famous quantum algorithms like Shor's, Grover's, and quantum machine learning algorithms. Built with performance optimization to simulate circuits with up to 20 qubits on standard hardware.
